user.title: Inverter Controller Settings
user.description: Select the entities from your Home Assistant that the controller will use to calculate the power balance.

data_description.grid_sensor: The sensor measuring your home's net power (Positive for import, Negative for export).
data_description.soc_sensor: The sensor reporting your battery state of charge in percentage (0-100%).
data_description.solar_sensor: The sensor measuring raw solar/PV power production.
data_description.inverter_limit_entity: The Number or Slider entity used to physically set the inverter's output limit.
data_description.min_power: The absolute lowest power the controller will set (usually 100W).
data_description.step_size: The amount of Watts to add or subtract in each adjustment cycle.
